message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me at $18,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $18,000. I would like to propose $16,000 as a fair price for the product.
